Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD! I like it!
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I like my new Vaio E series laptop.The only reason that I gave it 4 stars is because I do not like the mouse pad area. It clicks and I have to press hard to make it respond. It also does not "drag" very well...So, I plugged in my USB mouse and love the way that works!I mainly bought my Sony Vaio E for my graphics program / Corel Draw.I was very frustrated at first having to learn Windows 8. But after I Googled Windows 8 for Dummies and downloaded the PDF things were much smoother. Its not so bad once you learn it. Not sure I would want to use it daily ( I use my iMac daily) but the Sony is nice.I LOVE the white color on white keyboard. I LOVE the way the keyboard is backlit! Cool!The battery lasts about 5+ hrs. Which is perfect!The screen tilt is great too. Nice monitor color.My only complaint so far is the mouse pad area needs to be reinvented.I read reviews and read many before I decided on buying the Sony Vaio E.So, writing this review I hope I have helped someone make a good decision.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy with my product
Reviews.Author: Pablo Acosta
Reviews.Content: 5 stars because it is what I was looking for, fast, large capacity and good looksI would have liked to include blu ray but it is very important

Reviews.Title: Great Pink PC!
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: Great PC and it does it all! I disliked the Windows 8 (all new pc's get it, like it or not).  I loaded the "START8" program (only $5), and now I have all the advantages of Windows 7! And if I want to go back to Win 8, no problem.  This is the third Sony VAIO I have purchased (in the past 10 years), and the pink laptop is for my daughter. Sony VAIO's are always fast and RELIABLE! And super Sony software included. Sony is the best!

Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL AND WORKS WELL FOR THE PRICE.
Reviews.Author: ARTURO SAMANO
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an economical alternative to my little girl using my expensive laptop computer and it works pretty good for going on youtube and browsing online.  I highly recommend this for its looks, it looks as if barbie or hello kitty designed it.  Also it has an illuminated keyboard.  You cannot see it on the picture but the touch pad has a classy chrome trim around it.

Reviews.Title: Issues began upon arrival
Reviews.Author: LaceyFaye23
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, I was surprised to find a sharp clear piece of plastic protruding from the crevice below the keyboard. It was obviously jammed in there when assembled and the only way to remove it is to dismantle the laptop. That's sloppy work and I am upset that it should need repair right out of the box.Also, within two weeks of owning this laptop, it's begun issuing different errors and restarting. It's even claimed that it could not find an operating system. Every time it restarts, it appears to run normally for a while, but soon has another problem that it needs to be restarted for.The laptop is very attractive, but at this point, that's the only positive thing I can say. I am extremely disappointed in this product.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Virginia Penaloza "three little pigs"
Reviews.Content: The product Is Great , I researched a laptop for a while now but was undecided witch one to get , been a amazon customer for a while , I received it is beautiful laptop works perfectly fine , absolutely what I was looking for really recommend it try it out .

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price
Reviews.Author: margaret
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop with the hopes of it running perfect, who else wouldnt have high expectations from a brand new laptop? Right from the start I started experiencing problems. A blue screen would appear and would have to restart the laptop, every other day. While I would be on the internet, with a few tabs open, ALL of them would refresh constantly and I would have to log back in to each. It freezes all the time, disconnects from the wifi every few minutes. It is just a horrible laptop. I contacted Sony about this issue, and they told me to do a few things, reset the BIOS, do a systems recovery, and if that didnt work, to refresh the whole PC. After I did that, I could not do anything on it. I couldnt download anything, no new web browser,(I was stuck using explorer), none of the websites worked, I couldnt personalize the laptop to my liking. It was all stuck on factory settings. I called Sony back,and they said its a normal, easy fix, and they would send a technician to replace my hard drive. If they knew this laptop has these issues, why do they sell this faulty laptop? AND Sony was very slow at contacting me back about these issues. No one called to set up an appointment to come fix it, I had to call them constantly to keep asking when someone will come, how long, and all they'd say was, "Im sorry for this inconvinience..." It took 2 weeks to finally get someone on the phone that told me what day they'd come. If I knew this laptop would bring me such trouble after owning it for 3 weeks, I would have never bought it. I am stuck with it now, and hopefully that hard drive that the man replaced will solve my issues, but this is a bad impression Sony gave me of their service, and products.Dont waste your money on this cute, but horrible working laptop!!!!

Reviews.Title: Crashes
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I have owned this lap top less than a month and I have decided to return it. It suddenly crashes, the error says "the computer ran into some kind of a problem and needs to be restarted". It would not be a problem if it happened once in a month or so, however it happens every other day. I have ordered a replacement. I hope the new one will not have this problem again.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Laptop and the service is exceptional!
Reviews.Author: Tatyana Rowe
Reviews.Content: Originally I ordered the Laptop in 14" and a week later it wouldn't load, so I returned and wanted to order an exchange, but I was told the computer wasn't available and I found this one 15,5" in the same price. Didn't have to pay for Return shipping either.Great Service!!

Reviews.Title: Very good laptop
Reviews.Author: Ken Anderson
Reviews.Content: I have needed a new laptop for years and the Sony is awsomew!!. I was a little reluctant to go to a model with Windows 8 OS but it has been very easy to learn. The computer has a lot of features and is so much faster than my old laptop. I would purchase this one again for sure.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: JapaneseG
Reviews.Content: Worse laptop ever.  Needed Windows 7.  Only one I could find that was reasonable.Mouse pad goes in and out.  I had to get a separate mouse/pad.Don't waste your time and money on this one.Piece of crap!

Reviews.Title: Not good do not purchase.
Reviews.Author: E.peterson
Reviews.Content: This product worked well initially but unfortunately after 8 months or so is started crashing continuously. I'm pretty upset by this but I guess you get what you pay for. Lesson learned

Reviews.Title: Pink Vaio
Reviews.Author: Luis F. Maldonado
Reviews.Content: I bought a better model for my son which I have no complains.  This model in particular it have cheap plastic.  The color in one particular corner, went from pink to white.  The lashes for the monitor are not strong enough, it wobbles too easy.  Not so good quality!

Reviews.Title: Horrible!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: This is the worst computer I have ever had! Takes forever to startup. Pretty much a paper weight! I had to breakout my older computer. Even right now the Sony sits there with a black screen. Stay Away

Reviews.Title: Love Sony
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Rojas
Reviews.Content: Great computer for the price that you pay.  I have spent many years with Sony and can't complain about this product.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointing..
Reviews.Author: YoGokhale
Reviews.Content: I gifted this to my sister and its hardly been 5 months and she has already had 2 issues with the laptop for which she had to take it to the Sony service center.. I have owned a Sony Vaio laptop before and HP Pavilion as well but have never come across such issues...very disappointing..

Reviews.Title: Not worth the cost.
Reviews.Author: Brittany Manuel
Reviews.Content: This computer is a really big waste of money. If you are thinking about buying this, do yourself a giant favor and don't. Save your money and buy something of better quality. Window's 8 is a gigantic disappointment, and because of how this laptop is built you can't just uninstall and reinstall 7, which was very sad. This laptop lasted 20 days before it started having daily crashes and freezes. Let me be clear, I use this for school. I bought this so I could have a realiable laptop you use for school and I can't even take my school online tests on this computer out of fear it will freeze and I will loose my date. I was extremely disappointed in this, if I could get my money back I definatly would, for a jobless student this laptop is a big mistake. The reason it gets 1 star is because its pink and pretty cute. But very much not worth it. I would buy this for like 100 bucks knowing what I know.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Comes with windows 8 - the worst operating system. No installation DVD! If the hard drive is broken there is no way to restore the system. Installation DVD costs $47. Poor reliability and poor build quality. Very upset. Not the quality of Sony. Poor reception WiFi. Really do not recommend.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Holly Beers
Reviews.Content: This computer is very cute and works great. I love the new windows 8. I also enjoy how quickly it runs and how sturdy it is. I like that it includes the side number panel. The only thing I do not like about it the battery life span. It could be A LOT better.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: AdamG
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift for my nephew so i can't say how great it is but I used it once and it operated very smoothly and looked great

Reviews.Title: Shipping very fast! Great seller!
Reviews.Author: Kauana Lopes Ferreira
Reviews.Content: I loved my new laptop. It is so beautiful. The keyboar are very pretty.  I did a very good business.

Reviews.Title: Best laptop ever!
Reviews.Author: Svetlana Rencheli
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my daughter's 11th Birthday. Hoped it will be really good, but it turned to be amazing! Great speed/performance, great quality/materials, light, beautiful finish and outlook. Backlit keyboard makes it perfect at night. Great computer for adult as well as for child.

Reviews.Title: The good and the not so good about my Sony VAIO laptop
Reviews.Author: Catrinka
Reviews.Content: This is my second Sony VAIO. I loved my first one, model PCG-7184L (definitely a 5-star in my book). It served me well these past several years with no problems until I recently destroyed the display by dropping it.I much preferred the high-quality look and feel of the old VAIO model...and not just because of the silver finish versus the pink color of this one. Although in all fairness, I'm sort of liking the pink. Based on other reviews, I was afraid that it would look like it belonged in Barbie's Dream House. But, with its pearlized salmon pink finish, it seems considerably more of a "beachy" look to me.This new model's keyboard seems more cheaply made. Perhaps this lighter-weight, flimsier keyboard surround is a necessity due to the backlighting of the keys; but it just doesn't seem as sturdy and well put-together as my last one. The backlighting is a nice feature; but for daytime, I actually find the lettering on the keys to be difficult to see since they are faintly imprinted instead of darker lettering. This is a fairly minor point, though, since my fingers pretty much know where everything is on the keyboard. My opinion is mixed as to the number pad on the side of the keyboard. I had expected this to be a feature that I liked, but it significantly shortens the width of the rest of the usable keypad. My fingers are going to have to relearn the "spacing" of the keys. Things will be slower for awhile.The touch pad doesn't work as well on this one and tends to cause the cursor to jump around a bit. The surface of the touch pad actually rattles and feels like it might be a bit loose.  There is a small *bad spot* on touch pad that does not work at all.  It's a bit annoying for a new laptop; however, it's not a huge problem for me since I generally use a wireless mouse.As with my last VAIO, the center-mounted cam works just fine for Skyping.When you close the lid of the laptop, it goes into power-saving mode...a great feature that was available on my last VAIO.And last, but not least...the Operating System. Ugh. I'm truly trying to be optimistic that it's simply a learning curve and that eventually I'll come to like it as much or even more than Windows 7. There's a long way to go before that happens, though. Old dogs...new tricks, I guess.  (UPDATE 6/4/13:  I'm used to the new operating system now...so it's not an issue.)Bottom line, is that I DO actually like my new laptop. I probably seem a bit critical of it since there are some differences to get used to between it and my last one.

Reviews.Title: Super Fast and Adorable ! !
Reviews.Author: Deborah Leppert "zukigirl"
Reviews.Content: My new Sony VAIO is devastating fast and what's more . . . it's pink ! !  Couldn't have asked for more.

Reviews.Title: lllooovvveee it.
Reviews.Author: N.slack
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this Sony Vaio laptop. I love the back lighting on the keyboard which makes it easy to type in the dark. The number pad to my right is handy. The track pad is great too. It's not "overly sensitive" or "tricky" like some of the reviews stated. The laptop boots up pretty fast. I love windows 8. It just a little getting used to. After a couple days I was navigating thru the windows 8 OS rather comfortably. Laptop looks great as well.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: debra balfanz
Reviews.Content: I got this for my partner, she really loves it. She is still learning how to use is. It is different form XP. I have been thinking on getting one for me too.

Reviews.Title: Birthday gift for my niece
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My neice loves it! She opened it up and as soon as it was charged she started using it. She is 11 yrs old and had no trouble using it. She is thrilled and loves the pink color. The processor is fast, the screen is a good size and it has a full size keyboard.Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Technical issues
Reviews.Author: Kgrass
Reviews.Content: I received the computer and windows 8 wouldn't work. After 2 weeks of working with Microsoft it was deemed that the software was installed improperly.

Reviews.Title: Good Computer but crashes
Reviews.Author: Malcolm
Reviews.Content: It is a very fast good computer. Good graphics, strong sounds. Comes with a lot of perks like music studio, movie studio windows 8 however there are some problems.It crashes about once a week. Most of the time it re configs itself and it works but once I had to call SONY and aftera few hours I had to system restore the whole comp.Would look at others comp first but if I couldn't find any I would buy this one again.

Reviews.Title: freezes all the time
Reviews.Author: Emilio
Reviews.Content: i've had the computer for 4 months. I don't use it every day, and I was only using it to do some homeworks and online surfing. The 3 months worked fine; it was slow to complete some tasks, but it worked fine. Until the 4th month, it became totally slow. The computer said that the it was freezing because of high usage of the disk (100%). When i was using only internet, outlook, and sometimes itunes. The updates helped with the freezing. Now i can use the computer and only freezes sometimes. However I'm very disappointment!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Change
Reviews.Author: kj
Reviews.Content: I was always an HP guy, but decided to go for a Sony this time because I was disappointed in the HP's performance.  I'm glad I did.  I'm very impressed with my Vaio; the performance is great; sorry I took so long.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money.
Reviews.Author: R. Rivera
Reviews.Content: This laptop sucks. It's very good looking but it sucks. I've ben using it for a month now and annoys me with a new problem every day. The metro apps are awful, most of the time when I'm using the Internet Browser it crashes every 5 to 10 min. When I try to open a new page looks like it's loading and after min or two waiting tells me that something went wrong with my Wi-Fi. I have another laptop, desktop PC, tablet and a phone, and I never have problems  with  Wi-Fi. When I click on the connection it says that I'm connected and have excellent strength signal. So, I disconnect and connect again and that's good for another 5 min.The Facebook app crashes on a daily base, the Netflix app crashed twice. Right now when I open the Netflix app I see just black icons so have to erase it and install it again.The window store is so limited. If you click on an app you like it redirects you to the website of the company that created that app, you have to register, make an account and sign in so you can download the app you want. This is so stupid, some of these websites ask you to download special program so you can download their apps. Can't they just offer you the apps that they have?This laptop is noisy for a brand new one.I will never buy Sony again.

Reviews.Title: Why 3 stars?
Reviews.Author: A. Kumar "MAGREATBUY"
Reviews.Content: Laptop is good but had some real trouble once I inserted a SD card. The display stopped working and had no choice but do a restore to factory settings. This wiped out the data and had to re-install a lot of stuff. The same SD card works fine on 3 other laptops.WIN 8 sucks!! This should not be a news to you. The 2 buttons that are removed for the mouse clicks below the touchpad is a real marvel in the engineering!! Why in the world will some designer do that? Crap!!

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 is very hard to use
Reviews.Author: E. Storey
Reviews.Content: The computer comes with a strange (make that very strange) OS, and very few instructions.  Much of what Vista does well, this does not do at all or poorly.  Even trying to update Apps, leaves me with an unexplained "pending" state.  I would much rather have Vista on this machine.  There are a few imporvements, like the start page, but there is no "windows explorer" just a poor knockoff.My advice: try as hard as you can not to get windows 8

Reviews.Title: US-SVE14A390X-LBOM VAIO E Series 14P Custom Touch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Sundar Natarajan
Reviews.Content: Hi There,Good Evening!  I am not expecting  a support on my comments  , I have returned the product with in a day of arrival , I want to make sure someone is hearing it at least Sony should listen to customer feedback if they are not happy  ,  This was my first Sony product , I was very much excited on this purchase ,  waited nearly 10 days for the arrival , I spent about 3 hrs on the laptop . End of the day I wasted my time and shipping cost for the product which I am not happy.Video Chat -(Skype)-- disconnected or crashed multiple times , and the web cam is really horrible clarity , this is not HD webcam (usb 2.0 Cam ) I have a dell dual core which has excellent  picture clarity for video chat compare to this, so after spending close to 1000$ can't  we expect a decent cam ? so the laptop is not solving the basic propose.Fan noise on the brand new computer, I was totally lost, I re-checked the package to make sure this laptop is from SONY. Boot Up time ..i have specifically ordered 7200 RPM HDD for faster I/o  , the boot up time is slower than 5400 rpm . really  disappointed .

Reviews.Title: Sucky laptop don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: kat
Reviews.Content: This is the worst laptop I Have ever had the material sucks scratches easily and I don't even bring it anywhere it already has wear tear its only 4 months it deletes all my files it freezes there's a white spot on my screen this laptop sucks.the video is horrible the USB stopped working but they are working again it always does disk repair always shows blue screen says computer ran into an issue

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-3120M Processor (2.5 GHz)
6 GB DDR3 RAM
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.5-Inch Screen, Intel HD Graphics 4000
Windows 8 Consumer
ProductInfo.Name: Sony VAIO E Series SVE15134CXW 15.5-Inch Laptop (White)
